name: Measuring Tape
description: Our measuring tape consists of a ribbon of cloth, plastic, fibre glass, or metal strip with linear measurement markings

name: Screwdriver
description: Our Special screwdriver has a handle and a shaft, ending in a tip the user puts into the screw head before turning the handle.

name: Wrench
description: Our higher quality wrenches are typically made from chromium-vanadium alloy tool steels and are often drop-forged.

name: Hammer
description: Our special carpentry and blacksmithing hammers are generally wielded from a stationary stance against a stationary target.

name: Hand saw
description: Is your DIY project list growing long? Cut it down to size with the best handsaws available today. Our experts bought and tested.

name: Shovel
description: The design of the shovel determines the lifespan of the tool. If the trowel has a one-piece design, then it will last for a long time.

name: Hacksaw
description: Our hacksaws are hand saws with a C-shaped walking frame that holds a blade under tension. Such hacksaws have a handle, usually a pistol grip..

name: Knife
description: Compact Fixed Blade Folding Knife fits comfortably in most pockets. It can also be stored and accessed easily with its belt clip.

name: Toolbox
description: Carry power tools, hand tools, gear, and other medium-to-large items in the STANLEY® 28 in. FATMAX® Structural Foam Toolbox.
